posts.message:
دعوة للتسامح
كل عام وانتم بخير
ارجو ان يمن الله على الجميع بالمغفرة والرحمة وان يتقبل منا النيات والاعمال
وارجو من الجميع انه من بينه وبين اخية او اى احد خصومة ان يسامحة وان يصالحة
اجعلها لله
انت مش ضامن تكون موجود تانى فى اليوم دة اجمل يوم طلع عليه الشمس
دة مش كلامى
دة كلام الرسول صلى الله عليه وسلم
مش يمكن ربنا يكرمك باستجابة دعواتك فى اليوم دة
طيب خايف تتصل بيه يمكن يحرجك
طيب ما تبعت له رسالة وتجرب مش يمكن هو برضة عايز يصالحك بس خايف لانت تحرجة
متنساش ابوك وامك واخواتك من الدعاء والاتصال والزيارة
طيب فى حد منهم مش موجود فى الدنيا
طيب متنسهوش من الدعاء
ومتنساش تتصل بحبايبه واصدقائة اللى كان بيحبهم ويودهم وعلى فكرة دة برضة من صلة الرحم
جرب مش حتخسر حاجة
ادعى لنفسك ولاهلك ولحبايبك ولبلدك ولجميع المسلمين
واتاكد انك لو فكرت فيهم فاكيد ربنا حيخليهم برضة يفكروا فيك
مش يمكن طلبك او دعائك لسة مستجابش عشان ربنا عايزك تتقرب ليه بصلة الرحم
ويمكن ربنا عايز دعاء احد الصالحين ليك
وخلى بالك حتحس بسعادة كبيرة جدا وانت بتسعد غيرك
هو انت تقدر تعيد لوحدك
مش ممكن طيب ما نكون كلنا سعداء
وتكون سبب فى اسعاد غيرك
يمكن بدعوة او تليفون او حتى رسالة
ادعى منتاش خسران حاجة
ومتنساش تدعى لاخوك كاتب الرسالة
اخوك اللى يمكن تعرفة او متعرفهوش
اخوك
.....................................منقول

posts.message:
Are you an Entrepreneur? Do you have an Idea on Web or Mobile Field?
Come and Join Us @ Google Developers Group Alexandria - GDG Alexandria
DevFest (Developers Festival) Event 
Join, Launch Your idea and Win The DevFest

https://www.facebook.com/events/221561501342997/
posts.caption: DevFest Alexandria 2013
posts.description:
Our biggest upcoming event in Alexandria this year, "DevFest Alexandria 2013".
-------------------------------------------------------
Title: DevFest Alexandria 2013
Organizer: Google Developer Group Alexandria
Organizing Partner: Google Student Ambassador Alexandria
Location: Le Ciel Hall Down Town Alex
Date: Two Successive Saturdays (26 October 2013 09:00 AM-09:00 PM | 2 November 2013 09:00 AM-07:00 PM)
-------------------------------------------------------
Registration (Free Tickets): https://devfestalex2013.eventbrite.com/
Email Inquiries (Rofayda): devfest@gdgalex.org
Phone Inquiries (Mostafa): +201006679583
-------------------------------------------------------
Transportation: Buses will be available for confirmed attendees
Requirements: Good technical background + interest season's topics
Get your registered free ticket printed, or on your smart device with you, you'll have to show it on the entrance.

###############################
Cool presents for all attendees, and high value prizes for the first three winners of event's competition. ;)
###############################

About: GDG DevFests are large scale community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across Google product areas, all-day hack-a-thons or both. Each GDG DevFest will be inspired by and uniquely tailored to the needs of the developer community that hosts it. But while no two events will be exactly alike, each GDG DevFest will, at its core, be powered by a shared belief that when developers come together to exchange ideas, amazing things can happen!

-------------------------------------------------------

Event Agenda
The Event will be held on two Successive Saturdays (26 October 2013 | 2 November 2013)
Day #1 (26 October 2013) - Full day Sessions about Cutting Edge Technologies & Products
- Google Cloud Platform
- Google APIs
- HTML 5
- Android
- Python
    
Day #2 on (2 November 2013) - Full day Hackthon
A Hackathon will be a challenge for a group of talented deveolpers to come with a creative and useful idea within a time frame in one day. Hackathon rules will be announced on day #1. By the end of the Hackathon, Winners will be announced and they shall receive prestigious gifts sponsored by Google.
Participation in the Hackathon requires additional onsite registration in Day #1.

-------------------------------------------------------

Event Page On:
Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/events/c2la5pj1pqeff7e63dgvkcuccb4
Official Chapter: https://developers.google.com/events/5443107852124160/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/events/221561501342997/
Eventtus: http://eventtus.com/event/525716ea8c5b942d21000008/

-------------------------------------------------------

Hashtags: #devfest #gdgalex #egypt #alexandria #devfest_alex_2013


Social Media:
GDG Alexandria
- Facebook: http://facebook.com/AlexGTUG
- Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/communities/103555365121288722183/
- Twitter: http://twitter.com/GDGAlex


GDG Women Alexandria
- Facebook: http://facebook.com/GDGWomen.Alexandria
- Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/u/0/115893474703226527198/
- Twitter: http://twitter.com/GDGWomen

-------------------------------------------------------

Hurry Up and Register to be part of this huge event and to witness our Amazing Surprises during the two days.
Confirmations will be sent to attendees prior to the Event by Email & Phone.
Get ready, spread the word and tell your friends.
We look forward to See you there!
